comments.text:
Created attachment 508512
bug screenshot

Build Id:

Note: This works fine on the N900 and OSX Desktop on today's nightly. I can reproduce this on a Samsung Vibrant.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to http://people.mozilla.com/~chowse/drop/mozilla.com/input/3.0/proto/mobile/feedback.html#rate
2. Pan down about a 1/4 or 1/2 of the page

Actual Results:
Most of the rate your experience rows have a dark grey overlay.

Expected Results
comments.creator: mozaakash@gmail.com
